stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

SPLASH

SPLASH : SPLASH

SPLASH : enter / #123; splashCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

SPLASH : 1. do / #123; splashCount_ms++#59; #125;

HOME

HOME : HOME

HOME : enter / #123; clearScreen = true#59; #125;

MAIN_MENU

MAIN_MENU : MAIN_MENU

MAIN_MENU : enter / #123; clearScreen = true#59; #125;

SECONDARY_MENU

SECONDARY_MENU : SECONDARY_MENU

SECONDARY_MENU : enter / #123; clearScreen = true#59; #125;

CALIBRATION

CALIBRATION : CALIBRATION

CALIBRATION : enter / #123; clearScreen = true#59; #125;

UPDATE

UPDATE : UPDATE

UPDATE : enter / #123; clearScreen = true#59; #125;

ROOT.(InitialState) --> SPLASH

SPLASH --> HOME : do [splashCount_ms >= splashDuration_ms]

HOME --> MAIN_MENU : MENU

MAIN_MENU --> HOME : HOME

MAIN_MENU --> SECONDARY_MENU : SELECT

SECONDARY_MENU --> HOME : HOME

SECONDARY_MENU --> UPDATE : SELECT

CALIBRATION --> HOME : HOME

UPDATE --> CALIBRATION : CAL

UPDATE --> HOME : HOME

UPDATE --> HOME : SELECT
Events
settings
